pr_title: GEODE-8630: Add Redis UNLINK command as synonym to DEL

timeline.message:
GEODE-8630: Add Redis UNLINK command as synonym to DEL

- This does not implement async deletes

UNLINK should be unsupported

Authored-by: Jens Deppe <jdeppe@vmware.com>

timeline.bodyText: We should update this docs file as well redis_api_for_geode.html.md.erb. It may also be good to ask John Martin to review these doc updates.
timeline.author: sabbey37
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -207,7 +207,7 @@ start server \
 |                    	| SUNION                                             	| CLUSTER RESET                 	|
 |                    	| SUNIONSTORE                                        	| CLUSTER SAVECONFIG            	|
 |                    	| TIME                                               	| CLUSTER SET-CONFIG-EPOCH      	|
-|                    	|                                                    	| CLUSTER SETSLOT               	|
+|                    	| UNLINK [1]                                         	| CLUSTER SETSLOT               	|

timeline.bodyText: We said it was Unsupported in the README, but added it as Supported here.  What did we ultimately decide?
timeline.author: sabbey37
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -142,6 +142,7 @@
   RENAME(new RenameExecutor(), SUPPORTED, new ExactParameterRequirements(3)),
   TTL(new TTLExecutor(), SUPPORTED, new ExactParameterRequirements(2)),
   TYPE(new TypeExecutor(), SUPPORTED, new ExactParameterRequirements(2)),
+  UNLINK(new DelExecutor(), SUPPORTED, new MinimumParameterRequirements(2)),
